protein.specific_function: Converts UDP and GlcNAc-1-P into UDP-GlcNAc, and UDP and GalNAc-1-P into UDP-GalNAc. Isoform AGX1 has 2 to 3 times higher activity towards GalNAc-1-P, while isoform AGX2 has 8 times more activity towards GlcNAc-1-P.

pathway.name: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

reference.reference_text: Diekman AB, Goldberg E: Characterization of a human antigen with sera from infertile patients. Biol Reprod. 1994 May;50(5):1087-93.
